attributes.action: Decrease the death toll of Gaza by putting sanctions to Israel
attributes.additional_details: I am writing to express my deep concern and frustration over the ongoing humanitarian catastrophe in Gaza, where the death toll continues to rise at an alarming rate, and innocent lives are being lost by the thousands. As the UK watches this crisis unfold, I believe it is imperative that we take stronger, more decisive action to help alleviate the suffering of the Palestinian people in Gaza, much in the same way we have shown unwavering support for Ukraine in its struggle.
attributes.background: I am writing to express my deep concern and frustration over the ongoing humanitarian catastrophe in Gaza, where the death toll continues to rise at an alarming rate, and innocent lives are being lost by the thousands. rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Impose economic sanctions on Israel.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701379
